Happy that at 
@EY_UKI
 we continue to push for greater transparency by voluntarily publishing our sexual orientation & disability pay gaps alongside our existing gender & ethnicity ones 
 Lots of work to do, but another step on the journey! #PayGap #ComeOutForLGBT #DisabilityQuote Tweet
EY UKI
@EY_UKI
 · Feb 7
EY has published its 2019 UK #PayGap figures, covering gender, ethnicity and, for the first time, sexual orientation and disability. This in line with the firm’s commitment to promoting greater transparency. Find out more here: http://spr.ly/601419tpe
